result.purpose: This folder is responsible for managing database schema changes through SQL migration scripts.
result.architecture: The folder follows a sequential migration pattern where each file represents a specific change to the database schema, allowing for version control and rollback capabilities.

sql_migrations/00001_init_schema.sql.purpose: Initial schema setup for database with custom types and collation.
key_types: ENUM types for status, frequency, reward_claim_status

sql_migrations/00002_reward_schema_adapt.purpose: This file defines and modifies database schemas related to reward pools and campaigns.

sql_migrations/00003_reward_pool_modific.purpose: Modifies the 'actions' table to update and standardize activity types using an ENUM type.

sql_migrations/00004_reward_pool_related.purpose: This file contains migration scripts to modify the reward_fund_sources table and update the reward_pool_status type.

sql_migrations/00005_integrate_discord_x.purpose: Creates tables to manage verification actions for Discord and Twitter users in quests.

sql_migrations/00006_update_reward_pool_.purpose: Updates the reward pool status and modifies the reward_pools and roles tables.

sql_migrations/00007_reward_pool_top_up_.purpose: Defines a migration for creating and dropping a table related to reward pool top-up transactions.

sql_migrations/00008_claim_reward.sql.purpose: This file defines database migrations for managing participant rewards and related statuses.

sql_migrations/00009_create_table_guidan.purpose: Creates a new table for activities guidance and updates permissions for roles.

sql_migrations/00010_view_audit_role.sql.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to update database schema and permissions related to audit roles and participant rewards.

sql_migrations/00011_safely_use_enum.sql.purpose: This file defines a migration to add and remove permissions in a database.

sql_migrations/00012_add_quest_id_to_que.purpose: Adds a quest_id column to the quest_history_logs table.

sql_migrations/00013_unregister_activity.purpose: Defines a database migration for adding match types and results, and creating a game match history logs table.

sql_migrations/00014_update_action_enum..purpose: Updates the permission_action enum and inserts new permissions into the permissions table.

sql_migrations/00015_constraint_reward_a.purpose: This file defines a database migration that adds a unique constraint and modifies enum types.

sql_migrations/00016_game_match.sql.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to modify the game_match_history_logs and reward_pools tables.

sql_migrations/00017_user_reward_amount..purpose: This file contains migration scripts to modify the participant_rewards table by altering columns related to reward amounts.

sql_migrations/00018_complete_quest_time.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to update the database schema for quest completion tracking.

sql_migrations/00019_sponsor_api.sql.purpose: This file manages database migrations for adding and removing sponsor-related permissions.

sql_migrations/00020_remove_distribution.purpose: Removes and restores a specific permission from the roles table for the 'quest_master' role.

sql_migrations/00021_numeric_columns.sql.purpose: Migrates numeric columns in quest_rewards and reward_pools tables to a new numeric format.

sql_migrations/00022_migration_name_.sql.purpose: Defines a database migration with up and down SQL queries.

sql_migrations/00023_manual_update_distr.purpose: This file defines a database migration to add a new permission and update roles accordingly.

sql_migrations/00024_remove_granting_flo.purpose: This file manages the migration of database schema changes related to reward pools and participant reward pools.

sql_migrations/00025_internal_release.sq.purpose: Defines a migration for creating and dropping the quest_whitelists table and updating quest_infos.

sql_migrations/00026_first_come_first_se.purpose: This file contains database migration scripts for modifying tables and types related to quest rewards and permissions.

sql_migrations/00027_verify_new_activiti.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to modify database schema and types related to activities and logs.

sql_migrations/00028_adjust_purchase_his.purpose: Adjusts the schema of the purchase_history_logs table by modifying primary keys and adding a new column.

sql_migrations/00029_quest_data_game_and.purpose: Creates and drops the game_played_logs table for tracking game play data.

sql_migrations/00030_distribute_permissi.purpose: This file contains migration scripts to add and remove a permission ID for the 'quest_master' role.

sql_migrations/00031_discovery_center.sq.purpose: Defines enum types and creates tables for a discovery center feature in a database.

sql_migrations/00032_quest_table_indexes.purpose: Defines SQL migrations for creating and dropping indexes on specific tables.

sql_migrations/00033_quest_master_view_r.purpose: This file defines a migration to update role permissions for 'quest_master'.

sql_migrations/00034_fullpage_widget.sql.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to update the database schema and manage data for widgets and social platforms.

sql_migrations/00035_prod_schema_patch.s.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to update the production database schema and seed initial data.

sql_migrations/00036_add_studios.sql.purpose: This file adds multiple studio entries to the discovery_studios table in the database.

sql_migrations/00037_category_values.sql.purpose: This file contains SQL migration commands to update the discovery_categories table by truncating it, adding a new column, and inserting category values.

sql_migrations/00038_community_gaming.sq.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to insert data into discovery_studios and discovery_categories tables.

sql_migrations/00039_studios_auto_increa.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to create a sequence and reassign IDs for the discovery_studios table.

sql_migrations/00040_widget_trending_tok.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to modify database types and tables for widget functionality.

sql_migrations/00041_discovery_calendar_.purpose: Defines a new table for discovery event items and modifies existing types for event categorization.

sql_migrations/00042_quest_drop_reward_c.purpose: This file modifies the database schema by dropping specific constraints and adding new columns to the reward_infos table.

sql_migrations/00043_quest_user_reward_i.purpose: Creates indexes on the participant_rewards table for optimizing query performance.

sql_migrations/00044_quest_ron_stacked_a.purpose: This file contains SQL migration commands to modify the 'activity_type' and 'platforms' enums by adding new values.

sql_migrations/00045_discovery_home_bann.purpose: This file defines database migrations for creating tables related to discovery home banners and action logs.

sql_migrations/00046_discovery_feature_i.purpose: Creates tables and indexes for managing discovery feature banners and associated data.

sql_migrations/00047_user_activity_index.purpose: Creates indexes for optimizing queries on participant_quests and participant_actions tables.

sql_migrations/00048_quest_center_v2.sql.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to modify the database schema for quest-related tables.

sql_migrations/00049_quest_on_offchain_a.purpose: This file defines a migration to alter activity types and platforms in the database.

sql_migrations/00050_new_widget.sql.purpose: This file contains SQL migration commands to modify the schema of discovery_widget_items and discovery_widgets tables.

sql_migrations/00051_discovery_auth_v2.s.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to update the schema of discovery-related tables by modifying columns.

sql_migrations/00052_profile_as_precondi.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to add and remove a column in the quest_infos table.

sql_migrations/00053_ronin_fest.sql.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to modify database schema and create new tables for a quest and event management system.

sql_migrations/00054_add_reward_performa.purpose: This file adds and removes indexes to optimize database queries related to rewards and quests.

sql_migrations/00055_pool_reward_amount..purpose: This file contains SQL migration commands to modify the quest_rewards and quest_pools tables.

sql_migrations/00056_point_tracker.sql.purpose: Creates and drops the point_trackers table for tracking user points in a rewards system.

sql_migrations/00057_ronin_fest_event_up.purpose: This file contains SQL migration scripts to update the events table and create related tables for event sponsorships and user interactions.

sql_migrations/00058_shop_schema_complet.purpose: Defines the complete schema for a shop including item types, categories, tiers, and items.

sql_migrations/00059_allow_temp_premium_.purpose: Creates a temporary table for premium users with unique constraints and an index.
